    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddBooking
    CLI command to issue a booking.
    AddCustomer
    CLI command to add a new customer.
    AddCustomerWindow
    Window for adding a new customer.
    AddFlight
    CLI command to add a new flight.
    AddFlightWindow
    Window for adding a new flight.
    Admin
    Admin user with management privileges.
    AdminDashboard
    Admin dashboard for managing flights and customers.
    AdminDataManager
    Persists admin data to and from text storage.
    AuthenticationService
    Authentication service for login and registration.
    BookFlightWindow
    Booking window that shows dynamic pricing and seat availability.
    Booking
    Represents a customer booking for a flight.
    BookingDataManager
    Persists booking data to and from text storage.
    CancelBooking
    CLI command to cancel a booking.
    CancelBookingWindow
    GUI window to cancel an existing booking.
    Command
     
    CommandParser
    Parses CLI commands and creates command objects.
    Customer
    Customer class.
    CustomerDashboard
    Customer dashboard for viewing flights and managing bookings.
    CustomerDataManager
    Persists customer data to and from text storage.
    DataManager
    Interface for data persistence managers.
    DeleteCustomer
    CLI command to delete (soft-delete) a customer.
    DeleteCustomerWindow
    GUI window to delete (soft-delete) a customer.
    DeleteFlight
    CLI command to delete (soft-delete) a flight.
    DeleteFlightWindow
    GUI window to delete (soft-delete) a flight.
    EditBooking
    CLI command to update a booking to a different flight.
    Flight
    Represents a flight and manages passenger bookings and pricing.
    FlightBookingSystem
    Core system model holding flights, customers, and admins.
    FlightBookingSystemData
    Aggregates all data managers for loading and storing system state.
    FlightBookingSystemException
    Domain-specific exception for Flight Booking System operations.
    FlightDataManager
    Persists flight data to and from text storage.
    Help
    CLI command to print the help message.
    IssueBookingWindow
    GUI window to issue a new booking for a customer.
    ListCustomers
    CLI command to list active customers.
    ListFlights
    CLI command to list available flights with dynamic prices.
    LoadGUI
    CLI command to launch the GUI (login window).
    LoginWindow
    GUI login window with navigation to registration and dashboards.
    Main
    CLI entry point for the Flight Booking System.
    MainWindow
    Legacy admin GUI window (pre-login flow) with basic management actions.
    RegisterWindow
    GUI window to register a new customer.
    Session
    Singleton session management.
    ShowCustomer
    CLI command to display a customer's details.
    ShowFlight
    CLI command to display a flight's details.
    UpdateBookingWindow
    GUI window to update an existing booking to a new flight.
    User
    Base class for all users in the system.
    ValidationService
    Validation service for uniqueness checks.
